name: Adri

services.title: Company profile
services.description: We help with the creation and development of company profile, from quick and easy or long-term commitment.

services.title: Web maintenance
services.description: We will maintain your website in term of activities and connecting various services into the web.

services.description: We build and optimize your online presence. Create your own E-Commerce site complete with payments and whole shebang.

services.title: Back-End Engineering
services.description: We creates fulfilling back-end API for your needs.

aboutpara:
A committed web engineer with a strong passion for ethical practices and ongoing learning. Experienced Project
 Manager in freelance work, skilled in managing programmers and navigating changing schedules while gaining
 expertise in JavaScript frameworks, including ReactJS, ExpressJS, and NextJS. Proficient in Full-Stack Web
 Development using JavaScript and PHP frameworks, with capability in various SQL and NoSQL databases such as
 MySQL, Postgres, and MongoDB. My unique combination of skills and experiences positions me for advancement,
 from a junior role to a tech lead. Eager to contribute expertise, encourage innovation, and continue lifelong learning
 in the dynamic field of web development.

resume.tagline: I'm a software engineer focused on web development.
resume.description: Dedicated web engineer and freelance Project Manager skilled in JavaScript, ReactJS, ExpressJS, NextJS, and Full-Stack Web Development. Experienced in managing programmers and adapting to changing schedules. Positioned for advancement, I am eager to contribute expertise and foster innovation in web development.

experiences.bullets: Developed 4 projects using Javascript stacks (ReactJS - ExpressJS - NextJS), Developed for about 10 websites using HTML-CSS-Bootstrap-PHP (before migrating to JS), Utilized Extreme Programming Agile Methodology in all software projects developments,Fulfilled more than 85% customer needs in terms of web functionality and desktop & mobile friendly design

experiences.position: Full-Stack Web Deveoper at CV SINAR INTI PELANGI
experiences.bullets: Creating a full-stack website for both Company Profile and Internal Usage, Creating 2 Excel scripts to manage old data and help the migration process, Migrating 4 Excel files consisted of roughly 8 sheets to the database, Editing images and videos for website content

experiences.position: Full-Stack Web Deveoper at CV SINAR INTI PELANGI
experiences.bullets: Creating a full-stack website for both Company Profile and Internal Usage, Troubleshooting simple hardware problems, Migrating roughly 12 sheets of Excel to the database, Digitalizing paperworks

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Software Engineering with GPA of 3.31, creating Final Project titled: Web-based Expert System for Melon Cultivation using Extreme Programming Method
